user_instruction: 'Send an email to Alex (alex.johnson@globaladc.org) with the updates on our project. You can check out my Gmail and Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["alex.johnson@globaladc.org"],"subject":"Project Update: Next Steps for Traffic Flow Analysis","body":"Hi Alex,

I wanted to share a quick status update on our project:

• The traffic-flow dataset from last quarter was sent to you last week and the initial review is underway.
• Our next phase is to integrate that data with the existing efficiency models so we can locate key bottlenecks and start outlining solution options.
• We aim to have a draft of the proposed improvements ready for our upcoming research paper.

Could we schedule a brief call early next week to discuss initial insights and align on responsibilities for this phase? Let me know what works for you.

Thanks, and talk soon!

Best,
[Your Name]"}

formatted_items.content: Your email has been sent to Alex with the latest project updates.

final_output: Your email has been sent to Alex with the latest project updates.
